elf as a brave fighter; he commanded 3,000 men at the Battle of Nagakute a=

gn, he participated in the attack on Gifu Castle and at the actual Battle =

 Sekigahara commanded 3,600 men; at Sekigahara he acted as an escort to Ie=

ded Sawayama in =D4mi province but died in 1602, evidently as a result of =

ontingent was often known as Ii's 'Red Devils' for its fighting spirit (Ii=
